activities:
As part of Rypple's (or Work.com's) Web-based applications provided via http://www.rypple.com or http://www.work.com, customers are permitted to submit electronic data and information, including personal data, to Rypple's services.  Such personal data may include human resources data.  In this context, Rypple acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers' data is utilized in Rypple's services.  Rypple does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to Rypple's services, and any access to, or use of, such data by Rypple is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of Rypple, as data processor, to its customers.
As part of Rypple's internal operations, Rypple transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners for processing and storage. Rypple collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes.  In this context, Rypple acts as a data controller.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President & Chief Legal Officer
